name: Fruit Splash 2
description:
Tied of playing Farm Heros Saga or Jelly Splash?
Why don't you have a try with Fruit Splash 2 and make a big splash with your friends?

Completely free of hundreds of unique levels.
You will never wanna stop playing!

------------------------

New features that make you love this game.

* 10 unique game mode. Multiple mode make you different fun. 
* Leaderboards to complete against your friends via Facebook 
* Easy to learn, hard to master
* Colorful and vivid graphics
* No annoying time limits - Play at your own pace
* Over 100 levels with challenging obstacles - each one is unique and full of fun and amazing challenges
* Master the power of Super Fruits
* Seamless synchronization with Facebook
* Top-notch performance! Animated fruits and effects
* Free update with more levels

---------------------------

Fruit Splash 2 is completely free to play but some in-game items such as extra moves or lives will require payment or Facebook connection. To delete this feature, on your device go to Setting Menu->General->Restrictions option. You can then simply turn off In-App Purchases under "Allowed Content".

We're sure that you're going to love Fruit Splash 2! Please be sure to rate the game below. Your feedback will help us make the games you love even better.
